attributes.action: Make media companies release personal details in the interest of public safety
attributes.additional_details: This information could be used to stop terrorist attacks, get evidence for other criminal activities including pediphile and child abuse
attributes.background: We need informtion more easlierly available for the use of the police, MI5 and the Government to Make the United Kingdom a safe place for all of us to live, (including encrypted personal information)

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

Parliament has recently changed the law to increase the power of law enforcement and intelligence agencies to intercept communications, including those on certain media sites and devices. You can find out more about this law here:

http://researchbriefings.parliament.uk/ResearchBriefing/Summary/CBP-7518
